title: How to win promos [Serious]
body: I'm having a lot of trouble winning my promos, not sure what is going on, I've tried 3 times today and failed every time. Does something weird going on with the match making? I win every game leading up to promos, just seem to not be able to carry the promo games. Maybe I should wait for a duo for promos? I dunno, either way it's really frustrating that I've won more than I've lost today, yet I'm down 60LP

replies.body: You need to stop caring about rank, promos, LP and just play to improve
My main account is banned from the boards lol :)
i drop from silver 5 and get to silver 5 at will. its so fun
